attributes.action: Motion of No Confidence in Theresa May for not condemning Trump's Muslim Ban.
attributes.additional_details:
Mrs May refused to condemn Trump's divisive and hostile policy in suspending the US refugee system and bar on travellers from Muslim-majority countries, choosing cozying up to a radical and controversial President over humanity. 
The UN and international community has united in voicing its condemnation of the Executive Order issued by President Trump which suspends the refugee system for 120 days, and appalling decision in which thousands of lives are forced to make life threatening decisions.
attributes.background: Call for a motion in the House of Commons: 'That this House has no confidence in HM Government' following the PM's refusal to condemn Presidential orders restricting the entry of refugees and, in particular, Muslims into the US.
